column1: Smoque BBQ////BEST. BBQ. EVER!!! The chopped beef brisket platter is phenomenal
column2: so soft and moist. The sauce has the perfect amount of zing
column3: if its too much for you ask for their other sauce on the side. The mac and cheese is reaaallyyyy cheesy
column4: basically melts in your mouth as you eat it. I hate coleslaw but their coleslaw is to die for I can eat buckets of it a day! You can't go wrong with smoque if your looking for good BBQ.
